data.eml:eml: Checklist of earthworms (Oligochaeta: Lumbricidae) from Serbia: a review

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stojanović, Mirjana, Sekulić, Jovana, Trakić, Tanja (2018): Checklist of earthworms (Oligochaeta: Lumbricidae) from Serbia: a review. Zootaxa 4496 (1): 124-155, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4496.1.9
